detail_desc: Top in a cotton weave with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a wide peplum. Longer at the back.

Top in a cotton weave with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a wide peplum. Longer at the back.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes.
Short, sleeveless top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a sweetheart neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Short, sleeveless top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a sweetheart neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Short, sleeveless top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a sweetheart neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front and sleeves (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Ankle-length kaftan in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with an ombre effect. Round neckline with a small opening at the front and covered button at the top, and short sleeves. Vertical seam down the front and back and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Calf-length kaftan in a softly draping weave with a sheen. V-neck, short sleeves and a pleat at the back for added volume.
Calf-length kaftan in a softly draping weave with a sheen. V-neck, short sleeves and a pleat at the back for added volume.
Elasticated scrunchie in grained imitation leather.
Satin-covered Alice band with pearly plastic beads.
Satin-covered Alice band decorated with plastic beads.

Set in soft cotton. Sleeveless blouse in a patterned weave with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.

Ankle-length kaftan in an airy, heavily draping jacquard weave with a shimmering metallic pattern. V-neck, short sleeves with a small slit and fine fringing, and an asymmetric hem. Fine fringing around the edges.
Padded Alice band in grained imitation leather lined with velvet. Width 2-4 cm.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elasticated hem.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.

Kaftan in an airy weave containing shimmering metallic threads. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the top. Drawstring on the shoulders, discreet pockets in the side seams, and slits in the sides. Chiffon lining.

Calf-length kaftan in airy chiffon with a shimmering metallic jacquard pattern. V-neck, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Discreet pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Lace border around the neckline, sleeves and hem. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy, crinkled cotton weave with a slightly wider, gathered neckline and an opening at the front with narrow ties. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a softly draping, double-layered skirt.
Ankle-length kaftan in woven fabric with a V-neck, short sleeves and short slits in the sides. Shimmering sequined border around the neckline, sleeves and hem, and down the front.
Calf-length dress in a patterned modal and cotton weave with a V-neck and short sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and at the back, and an asymmetric skirt. Lined.
Short-sleeved, V-neck tunic in soft denim with pin-tucks around the neckline, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved, V-neck tunic in soft denim with pin-tucks around the neckline, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem.

Wide dress in airy, crinkled, softly draping chiffon with a V-shaped opening at the top and long, wide sleeves with a drawstring. Seam at the waist with a wide flounce and a drawstring with wide ties that fasten at one side. Lined.
Long, wide dress in a cool weave with a sheen. V-neck, a yoke at the back, gathered seams on the shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and on the skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in smocked fabric with overlocked, frilled edges. High waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in smocked fabric with overlocked, frilled edges. High waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Straight-cut coat in a soft weave with notch lapels, a one-button fastening, diagonal welt front pockets, and a single back vent. Unlined. The polyester content of the coat is recycled.
